name: Akali
title: the Rogue Assassin
shortBio: Abandoning the Kinkou Order and her title of the Fist of Shadow, Akali now strikes alone, ready to be the deadly weapon her people need. Though she holds onto all she learned from her master Shen, she has pledged to defend Ionia from its enemies, one kill at a time. Akali may strike in silence, but her message will be heard loud and clear: fear the assassin with no master.

skins.name: Stinger Akali
skins.description: The Order of the Great Sparrow Bee follows a brutal, time-honored training regimen, teaching students to sting with the ferocity and ceaselessness of a hornet. Akali is their greatest champion, and she intends to take the art to even greater heights.

skins.name: Infernal Akali
skins.description: A djinn summoned from the world below, the Infernal known as Akali will burn her patron's enemies to cindersâ€¦ though the cost for such service is always dire.

skins.name: All-star Akali
skins.description: A legendary all-star for Chaos FC, Akali was known for her aggressive style on the pitch. These days, she spends most of her time mentoring children and doing commercials for shoes.

skins.name: Nurse Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Hello, nurse! Goodbye, being alive.

skins.name: Blood Moon Akali
skins.description: Priestesses of the Blood Moon walk their own path, traveling far from the cult to pursue the whispers of their demons. A meditative figure living deep in the snow-dusted wood, Akali was the first woman to embrace her inner darkness, and speak directly with the Blood Moon itself.

skins.name: Silverfang Akali
skins.description: Former second-in-command of an honorable clan of assassins, Akali has broken from their ranks to find her own path. She plies her trade in the darkest corners of the world's largest metropolis, awaiting the day when she can establish a clan of her own.

skins.name: Headhunter Akali
skins.description: Her weapons flaring with alien energy, Akali hunts only the worthy in a dangerous game of life and death. Striking from anywhere at any moment, no living thing can escape her trophy wall.

skins.name: Sashimi Akali
skins.description: She's the fish ninja with speed on her side, the silent slicer, the death strike of deliciousness. Drop your guard and she'll assassinate your palate. It's your favorite and mine, Akali!

skins.name: K/DA Akali
skins.description: Akali's street aesthetic and hard-hitting lyrics inspired a dedicated fandom. She wields a microphone or kama as a hip-hop ninja, revolutionizing the stale scene with her raw talents.

skins.name: Prestige K/DA Akali
skins.description: K/DA Akali is on fire right now, spitting rap solos at the Pop Music Awardsâ€”and her prestigious costume is exactly what you'd expect from the new golden child of pop.

skins.name: PROJECT: Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.
Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 PROJECT event.

skins.description: A cutting-edge PROJECT subject who somehow escaped the City's boundaries, Akali brings dire warnings of an untested superweapon to those living in the wasteland beyond. With time running out and no other options, these outcasts join her in an attempt to take the mega-corporation downâ€¦ suspicious that their newfound ally might in fact be a double agent.

skins.name: True Damage Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: After the worldwide success of K/DA, Akali made it her mission to recruit accomplished and up-and-coming artists to form a new supergroup: True Damage. Never before has a crew been comprised of such diverse talent, ranging from natural lyricists to renowned producers to legendary vocalistsâ€”all ready to disrupt the music industry.

skins.name: K/DA ALL OUT Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.

skins.description: Fresh off her success with True Damage, Akali hits the stage full-throttle with her bold edge and fresh new direction. She spits fire with a mic in hand and pushes the band to the bleeding edge, because that's what the baddest do.

skins.name: Crime City Nightmare Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Crime City Nightmare event.

skins.description: A loyal enforcer for the Graves family, Akali took the same deal everyone else did when the Mysterious Gentleman came calling. The power changed her, twisted her into something that hears a siren song echoing from beyond the veil of reality. Now she acts in ruthless, horrific violence, seeking an inscrutable 'balance' even she cannot name.

skins.name: Prestige K/DA Akali (2022)
skins.description: K/DA Akali is on fire right now, spitting rap solos at the Pop Music Awardsâ€”and her prestigious costume is exactly what you'd expect from the new golden child of pop.

skins.name: Star Guardian Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Star Guardian event.

skins.description: On-again off-again co-captain of a new generation of Star Guardians, Akali's skill in battle is shadowed by her growing realization that the Oath she swore has condemned her to die. Though she fights for the light with all her heart, she finds that darkness is just as powerful... perhaps, even more so...

skins.name: DRX Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during DRX World Championship showcase.

skins.description: Honoring Zeka's winning performance as Akali during the 2022 World Championship.

skins.name: Coven Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.
This chroma was released as a Worlds 2023 Esports Premium Bundle exclusive.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

skins.description: They came to Akali encircling from the tree canopy at an impossible speed, their taunts leading her deeper still into the Elderwood until at last she was lost. Then a voice whispered the choice right into her ear: die in these woods alone or emerge in their charge. And so she walked out of the woods... straight into the arms of the Coven.

skins.name: Prestige Coven Akali
skins.description: Arriving clad in a bold and sporty body suit, Akali's gala attire has us all spellbound. Subversive and on the cutting edge of fashion, she's fierce and redefines how we think of the wicked witch of the woods.

skins.name: Empyrean Akali

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Empyrean event.

skins.description: Before her realm's destruction, Akali was rotting away in prison for a failed assassination attempt on a despotic warlord. Now on her own as an Empyrean, she views her newfound freedom as a sign to stop the evil she couldn't before. The realms need a defender, and Akali is determined to fight for them as long as she can.

passive.name: Assassin's Mark
passive.description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next Attack with bonus range and damage.

spells.name: Five Point Strike
spells.description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.
spells.dynamicDescription: Akali slings kunai in an arc, dealing <magicDamage>@Damage@ magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies at the tip by @SlowPercentage*100@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Twilight Shroud
spells.description: Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Move Speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Akali drops a smoke bomb, unleashing a spreading cover of smoke lasting @BaseDuration@ seconds and granting herself @MovementSpeed@% Move Speed decaying over @MovementSpeedDuration@ seconds.

Akali increases her max Energy by @EnergyRestore@ while the shroud is active.

While inside the smoke, Akali is Invisible.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Shuriken Flip
spells.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.
spells.dynamicDescription: Akali flips backwards as she throws a shuriken, dealing <magicDamage>@E1Damage@ magic damage</magicDamage> and marking the first enemy or smoke cloud hit. Akali can <recast>Recast</recast> this once to dash to the marked target, dealing <magicDamage>@E2DamageCalc@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Perfect Execution
spells.description: Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Akali vaults over an enemy champion, dealing @Cast1Damage@ magic damage to all enemies in her path.

Akali can Recast after @CooldownBetweenCasts@ seconds to execute a piercing thrust, dashing and dealing @Cast2DamageMin@ to @Cast2DamageMax@ magic damage based on missing health.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
